parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Failure Due to Master Cylinder Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can lead to a loss of braking power, causing accidents, injuries, or fatalities. The master cylinder defect can cause the brake pedal to go to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to stop the vehicle.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle vibrates when applying the brakes
especially when driving uphill or in inclement weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause a loss of control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities. The ABS failure can cause the brakes to grab and then release, allowing the vehicle to roll forward before stopping.
symptoms: the brakes grab and then release
the vehicle rolls forward before stopping

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dual fuel tank system can cause fuel leakage, fuel vapor lock, and engine stalling, leading to a loss of vehicle control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: fuel overflow from one tank to another

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to properly replace recalled tires can lead to tire failure, accidents, and injuries, as well as frustration and inconvenience for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Difficulty in getting recalled tires replaced
lack of communication from dealerships and manufacturers

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Belt Separation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure due to belt separation can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, as well as damage to the vehicle.
Failure to acknowledge recall requests can lead to delayed or incomplete repairs, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: Lack of response from dealerships and manufacturers
